name: By the Sea
description:
By the Sea is a 2D Tower defense game in which the player must defend his sand castles from incoming enemies.

The player is Tim, a kid on holiday with his mom and dad. His goal is to protect his main castles fixed at the end of the path from the enemies; he can do this using water and sand to build boosted castles as guard units.

The player can place the boosted castle previously created only in the shadow area under his parents' beach umbrella; when an enemy reached one of player's main castles, the same player has a chance to save it. In this case, he will play as Tim's hero, the defender of the Reign of Sand; this time he will aim to pass an action level to save the situation and turn back to the beach.

More information at: www.facebook.com/ByTheSeaGame
